channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump casts Maduro’s ouster as ‘smart’ move as Russia, China enter the fray

item.title: Seniors relive their days of wanderlust and thrill-seeking with virtual reality. ‘It’s about all the memories that it brings back’
item.description: “We got to go underwater and didn't even have to hold our breath!” exclaimed 81-year-old Ginny Baird following the virtual submersion.

item.title: California auditor finds millions in wasted dollars in state agencies

item.title: White House to share ballroom plans with commission in January
item.description: The White House will present its ballroom plans to the National Capital Planning Commission at a meeting next month.

item.title: New York Legalizes Doctors Prescribing Death
item.description: New York Gov. Hochul announced last week that she will sign a bill legalizing medically assisted suicide for adults with a terminal illness.
